item.description:
Bantam River, Bantam Lake, and Little Pond.
Bantam CT

Some or all of them... I am going to make it an enjoyable day for myself..
No set time the trip(s).

If you are interested....
From Litchfield, go west on route 202. from the Constitution Way stop light continue for 1.4 miles..turn left onto Bissel Road.
go 0.7 mile, veer right onto Whites Wood Road, and go 0.2 mile to the acess on the right just over the bridge.

I have a spare kayak, If Robyn goes, then she uses it..
Other wise its there for someone else...


Blue Toyota Avalon + 2 kayak trailer setup.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Recreational Kayak Event - Bantam River
